title: How to get rid of academic dishonesty - Cheating (academic) - Quora

response.answer_text: You can get rid of academic dishonesty by making an honest academic commitment; you can't get rid of it by only talking to the people who will check your statements. When the academic hierarchy engages in dishonesty, their contempt for intellectual honesty is virtually unquestioned. When people don't realize they're being dishonest, they believe they have no choice but to repeat the intellectual dishonesty and carry the burden alone. It is not only academics who are guilty of this act. When politicians make a commitment and then break it, the person on the receiving end often doesn't feel particularly victimized. However, this too fails to do justice to the situation. We want to punish our leaders for personal treachery, but not for betraying the public's trust!

I wish I knew…educate the consequences, make them sharp and pointed. if you cut corners in school would you do the same in the workplace ? Is it worth the risk? Not sure we could rid it..but we can stigmatize it
